entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon then light in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
